All of HostXNow's NVMe VPS Hosting plans include cPanel web hosting control panel, free SSL certificates, unlimited bandwidth, fast SSD storage and are fully optimised for WordPress.

FAQ

All servers are delivered within 24 hours (usually 2-4 hours)!

We have been operating as HostXNow since 2009, so over 11 years now!

We accept: credit cards and PayPal
